data.text: @NylaTheMusical Bless you for the conversation, sis. The information across these platforms are NECESSARY and so happy it only takes me seeking the information earnestly to find it. Comparing the dated articles to theories and thesis now is FUCKED.
@ITS_JUST_JALEN McCain is not the golden boy people make him out to be and I wish more people had access to that truth
@ITS_JUST_JALEN But that's what happens. You starve the people of information so that they no choice but to believe what you tell them. But there are those out there that know the truth.
@ITS_JUST_JALEN A WHOLE ASS STUNT
@NylaTheMusical RIGHT! Isn’t this wild??? I can find NONE of this exact information anywhere. And I’m like: “I smell a stunt”. https://t.co/weuv4b52Er

@ITS_JUST_JALEN I've never heard that he ever admitted it. Why would he. I have family that served with him. My history professor in college spoke about it as well. As far as being pardoned, I've never even heard that rumor.
@NylaTheMusical I’ve been reading some fact check articles and pulled up vietnam’s history of this event verses McCain’s and just—read this: https://t.co/XRnVEsYDRW
@ITS_JUST_JALEN Chiiiiile. The way people will revise history to fit the dominant narrative... the mental gymnastics! The cognitive dissonance! Never ceases to amaze.
@NylaTheMusical S P E A K
@NylaTheMusical Hell, I liked whoopi and Lena’s IG lost because I was like “sis, he did all THAT? Give him a biscuit, then!” But now, me and my laptop like this: https://t.co/2z1Hzw7LUZ

@ITS_JUST_JALEN It's really just a lack of information (which is by design) and people still buying into the kool aid that "serving this country" is an honorable thing. But arriving this country mean serving the ruling class, which mean exploiting vulnerable populations. That's the tea
@ITS_JUST_JALEN Lol yeah half my timeline had some sense, the other half was like https://t.co/uVRRdFwV1S

@NylaTheMusical I was SHOCKED because I saw a conglomerate of individuals, who are deep rooted people of color and culture, grieve his death. And then I came here and the w h o l e Twitter verse blew me the fuck up.

@ITS_JUST_JALEN Do it, there's a wealth of resources! I thought it was common knowledge, but I guess not. It weird seeing people grovel over him just because he (supposedly) never (publicly) disrespected Barack. Pick the bar up off the motherfucking floor for God's sake 🙄
@NylaTheMusical Can always count on you to bless me. Be blessed! Also, about to go uncover this research ASAP, gworl. You know me lmao.
@ITS_JUST_JALEN Also was SUPER in favor of the US invading Iraq
@ITS_JUST_JALEN The list goes on and on. People are just up his has because he was "respectful" while he terrorized. Fuck that shit
@ITS_JUST_JALEN When someone called Obama an "Arab" as an insult, he said "no, he's a good man, a family man". Implying that Arab men can't be that???
@ITS_JUST_JALEN Was against making MLK day a holiday
@ITS_JUST_JALEN Not only that, he voted against civil rights legislation 99% of the time
@ITS_JUST_JALEN https://t.co/T4IbXbCUQg
